thread.title: David Beckham posts Valentine's Day note on Instagram
thread.title_full: David Beckham posts Valentine's Day note on Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: David Beckham posts Valentine's Day note on Instagram
text:
David Beckham spent the weekend in New York supporting wife Victoria at her fashion show.
He took charge of their four children while the former Spice Girl prepared her collection for its public debut and took them to sit front row at the event.
On Tuesday, the soccer star posted a note to his Instagram wishing a happy Valentine's Day to Victoria and 'the amazing family she has given me ... 3 beautiful boys and an amazing little girl.'
Happy Valentine's Day: David Beckham posted a Valentine's Day note to wife Victoria on his Instagram Tuesday along with a black and white snap of them embracing
The celebrity couple wed in 1997 and share four kids: Brooklyn, 17, Romeo, 14, Cruz, 11, and Harper, five.
On Sunday, David shared a selfie with his children as they headed to the Natural History Museum in Manhattan.
He later took them out for pizza in Brooklyn.
His pride and joy: David gushed about the family his former Spice Girl wife had given him - Brooklyn, 17, Romeo, 14, and Cruz, 11, and Harper, five, pictured with him in NYC Sunday
Meanwhile, Victoria also took to Instagram Tuesday to show off an adorable Valentine card drawn by her daughter Harper.
Captioned: 'My little Valentine x VB', she took snaps off the front of the card with pink hearts as flowers.
The little Quote: : 'I love you mummy. Happy Valentine's Day. Will you be my Valentine? Love Harper.'
My little Valentine: Victoria Beckham posted an adorable shot of the handwritten card Harper made for her on Tuesday
Artistic: The card featured pink hearts and a red ribbon with an envelope addressed to 'mummy'
The famous family were spotted leaving New York via JFK airport on Monday as they headed home to London.
It's been a stressful couple of weeks for them after David's recent email scandal, which saw him call members of the Honours Committee in the UK 'unappreciative c***s’ after being snubbed for a knighthood.
Victoria was also dragged into the fray after coming under fire for pushing her brand amid the email scandal.
Close: The family are now back in London after spending a few days in New York to support Victoria, pictured in Soho Sunday, as she debuted her new fashion collection
Keep it chic in a sheer skirt like Victoria's Victoria Beckham AW17
Shop the current collection at Net-a-Porter
Buy now
Of course, one of the perks of being a designer is getting to wear your very own pieces before anyone else. So it was no surprise to see Victoria Beckham modelling this hot off the runway skirt!
It's from the AW17 collection, which the former Spice Girl presented in New York only last weekend. This skirt was definitely one of the standout styles, and we love the sheer fabric and razor sharp pleats. The midi length is super flattering, and when teamed with a crisp white shirt and flat top shades, VB proved just how far she has come since her early days as a designer!
You're going to have to wait a while until you can get your hands on this exact skirt, but that's our cue to help you get next season's look now.
So with that in mind, check out the similar skirts we've rounded up for you in the edit below. This £5(!) version from Urban Outfitters is almost too good to be true...
